revised_title: Evolution of the Vertebral Column in Amphibia and Amniota
tldr: The author examines the evolution of the vertebral column in Amphibia and Amniota, identifying four distinct lines of development based on the composition of the centra and the presence or absence of various cartilaginous elements. The study also discusses the homology of ribs and chevrons, as well as the origin and development of spinal nerves.
